00050 template < class V >
00051 struct CacheSetDiscardIgnore
00052 {
00061     void operator() ( const V& old_value, const V& new_value )
00062     {}    
00063 };
00064 
00071 template <class Value>
00072 struct Identity
00073 {
00074 
00080     Value& operator() ( Value& value ) const { return value; }
00081     
00087     const Value& operator() ( const Value& value ) const { return value; }
00088 };

00106 template < class Value,
00107            class HashFunction = hash<Value>,
00108            class KeyEqual = std::equal_to<Value>,
00109            class DiscardFunction = CacheSetDiscardIgnore< Value >,
00110            class Allocator = std::allocator<Value> // not used
00111 >
00112 class cache_set
00113 {
00114 private:
00116     typedef cache_table< Value, Value,
00117                          DiscardFunction,
00118                          HashFunction, KeyEqual,
00119                          Identity<Value>,
00120                          Allocator
00121                        > HT;
00122     HT m_ht;
00123         
00124 public:
00125 
00127     typedef typename HT::key_type key_type;
00128 
00130     typedef Value data_type;
00131     
00133     typedef Value mapped_type;
00134 
00137     typedef typename HT::value_type value_type;
00138 
00140     typedef typename HT::hasher hasher;
00141 
00143     typedef typename HT::key_equal key_equal;
00144 
00146     typedef typename HT::size_type size_type;
00147 
00149     typedef typename HT::difference_type difference_type;
00150 
00152     typedef typename HT::const_pointer pointer;
00153 
00155     typedef typename HT::const_pointer const_pointer;
00156 
00158     typedef typename HT::const_reference reference;
00159 
00161     typedef typename HT::const_reference const_reference;
00162 
00164     typedef typename HT::const_iterator iterator;
00165     
00167     typedef typename HT::const_iterator const_iterator;
00168     
00169     
00170 public:
00173     hasher hash_funct() const { return m_ht.hash_funct(); }
00174 
00176     key_equal key_eq() const  { return m_ht.key_eq(); }
00177 
00179     iterator begin()             { return m_ht.begin(); }
00181     iterator end()               { return m_ht.end();   }
00183     const_iterator begin() const { return m_ht.begin(); }
00185     const_iterator end()   const { return m_ht.end();   }
00186     
00187 public:
00188     
00193     cache_set() : m_ht() {}
00194 
00204     cache_set( size_type n ) : m_ht( n, hasher(), key_equal() ) {}
00205 
00211     cache_set( size_type n, const hasher& hash )
00212         : m_ht( n, hash, key_equal() )
00213     {}
00214 
00221     cache_set( size_type n,
00222                const hasher& hash,
00223                const key_equal& ke  )
00224         : m_ht( n, hash, ke )
00225     {}
00226 
00232     template <class InputIterator>
00233     cache_set( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
00234         : m_ht(  2 * std::distance( first, last ) )
00235     {
00236         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00237     }
00238 
00246     template <class InputIterator>
00247     cache_set( InputIterator first, InputIterator last, size_type n )
00248             : m_ht(  2 * n )
00249     {
00250         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00251     }
00252 
00261     template <class InputIterator>
00262     cache_set( InputIterator first, InputIterator last,
00263               size_type n, const hasher& h )
00264         : m_ht(  2 * n, h )
00265     {
00266         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00267     }
00268 
00279     template <class InputIterator>
00280     cache_set( InputIterator first, InputIterator last,
00281               size_type n, const hasher& h, 
00282               const key_equal& k )
00283         : m_ht(  2 * n, h, k )
00284     {
00285         m_ht.insert( first, last );
00286     }

00292     cache_set( const cache_set& other )

00294     {}

00301     cache_set& operator= ( const cache_set& other )
00302     {
00303         if ( &other != this )
00304         {
00305             m_ht = other.m_ht;
00306         }
00307         
00308         return *this;
00309     }

00316     {
00317         m_ht.set_empty_value( value );
00318     }
00319

00325     {
00326         return m_ht.get_empty_value();
00327     }

00342     pair<iterator,bool> insert( const value_type& obj )
00343     { return m_ht.insert( obj ); }
00344 
00352     template <class InputIterator>
00353     void insert( InputIterator first, InputIterator last )
00354     { m_ht.insert( first, last ); }
00355 
00362     iterator insert( iterator it, const value_type& obj )
00363     { return m_ht.insert( obj ).first; }
00364 
00372     iterator find( const value_type& item ) const 
00373     { return m_ht.find( item ); }
00374 
00383     size_type erase( const key_type& key ) { return m_ht.erase( key ); }
00384     
00389     void erase( iterator it ) { m_ht.erase( it ); }
00390 
00398     void erase( iterator first, iterator last ) { m_ht.erase( first, last ); }
00399 
00401     void clear() { m_ht.clear(); }
00402 
00411     void resize( size_type size ) { m_ht.resize( size ); }
00412 
00417     void swap( cache_set& other ) { m_ht.swap( other.m_ht ); }
00418 
00424     bool operator==( const cache_set& other ) const
00425     { return m_ht == other.m_ht; }
00426 
00432     bool operator!=( const cache_set& other ) const
00433     { return m_ht != other.m_ht; }
00434 
00440     size_type size()         const { return m_ht.size(); }

00455     
00459     bool empty()             const { return m_ht.empty(); }

00465     size_type num_collisions() const { return m_ht.num_collisions(); }

00472     friend inline void swap(
00473         cache_set<Value,HashFunction,KeyEqual,DiscardFunction,Allocator>& m1,
00474         cache_set<Value,HashFunction,KeyEqual,DiscardFunction,Allocator>& m2 )
00475     {
00476         m1.swap( m2 );
00477     }
